text: Navesi neramantoa nafuheta, Anumzamo'ma tagu'mavazinia zankura huama nehu'na avoma kreramizankura antahintahinimo'a tusiza huno onetige'na retro nehue. Hianagi menina mago'a zanku avona kreramisue hu'na huana, Knare Musenkema, Anumzamo'ma Agri'a ruotge hu'nea vahe'arema magoke zupa zami'neazamo maka kna mevava nehina, tamage nanekere tamentintima nehunazanku, tamentinti otretma hanavetita azeri akona hanazegu tamasmiza nehue.
